content: अभिमंत्रणं {@--1@} Consecrating, hallowing, making sacred by repetition of special formulas or Mantras; <ls>Y. 1. 237</ls>; मंत्रमुच्चारयन्नेव मंत्रार्थत्वेन संस्मरेत् . शेषिणं तन्मना भूत्वा स्यादेतदभिमंत्रणम् .. <ls>Mīmāmsā.</ls> {@--2@} Charming, enchanting. {@--3@} Addressing, inviting; advising.
